snippet: Morgan Stanley said on Monday that Paul J. Taubman, one of the co-heads of its core securities arm and a top deal maker, would retire at the end of the year, in an unexpected shake-up of the firm's senior management.
abstract: Morgan Stanley said on Monday that Paul J. Taubman, one of the co-heads of its core securities arm and a top deal maker, would retire at the end of the year, in an unexpected shake-up of the firm's senior management.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and SUSANNE CRAIG

headline.main: Deal Maker for Morgan Stanley Is Eased Out
headline.print_headline: Deal Maker For Morgan Is Eased Out
